values.DEFAULT: Sort by last change, last changed first.
values.CREATED_OLDEST_FIRST: Sort by created time, oldest first.
values.CREATED_NEWEST_FIRST: Sort by created time, newest first.
values.MODEM_NUMBER: Sort numerically on the number of the modem.
values.MODEM_NUMBER_INVERTED: Sort numerically on the number of the modem, inverted.

values.CREATED: Message was created but not sent to the device.
values.SENT: Message was sent to the device, but not acknowledged.
values.ACKNOWLEDGED: Message was sent to the device, and acknowledged.
